channel.title: 667/*** Hiscore help
channel.description:
I followed a tut about adding Hiscore to my server, but... everytime I log-out on the printscreen appears: Connecto to SQL failed. and I really don't know whats wrong. Could someone help me?
Thanks

item.title: 667/*** Hiscore help
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:4, topic:519720”]Do you know how to use MySQL? Like to you have a webhost etc etc

Did you put ur ip in remote MySQL thingy?[/quote]

  1. Not really, i’ve never used sql

  2. No, where do I put it¿

BTW am using your tutorial

Read full topic

item.title: 667/*** Hiscore help
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Flame_:

Are you using the right credentials for the SQL server? The error clearly tells you that the connection has failed, so make sure that you are inputing the correct login details to your SQL.

To be honest am very very new using SQL, I used to have hiscores on a 317, on a 667 no. And can’t find a decent tutorial

Read full topic
